alert.note: Alert for Kidder; Stutsman (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 01 at 8:34PM CDT until August 01 at 10:30PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM CDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Northern Kidder, southern Wells, southern Foster, and northern Stutsman Counties. * WHEN...Until 300 AM CDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 832 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 2 and 4 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are expected over the area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Carrington, Kensal, Bordulac, Pingree, Woodworth, Courtenay, Sykeston, Melville and Edmunds.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
